name: inDinero
headline: Financial dashboard for businesses.
description:
inDinero is on a mission to reinvent small business operations, helping our clients understand their finances like never before.

By combining a full finance team of bookkeepers, accountants, and CPA’s, with real time accounting software, we provide startups and small businesses the knowledge they need to understand their company's financial health and make better decisions with their money. Tax experts work with accountants under one roof to prepare and file our clients'​ taxes and maximize tax savings.

We're a growing company with big ambitions and big opportunities for internal mobility. If you’re interested in one of our open positions and looking for your next big professional adventure, drop us a line at jobs@indinero.com.

founders.name: Andy Su, Founder/CTO
founders.description:
I founded Pry (W21) with Alex, Hayden and Tiffany to solve small business financial planning.

I founded inDinero (S10) with Jessica Mah to automate small business accounting.

# Navigate Your Finances with Confidence: **Expert Accounting, Tax, and CFO Solutions**
Get the financial clarity and control you’ve been missing. Indinero’s team of experts can transform complex financial management into an afterthought. You focus on growth; we handle the numbers.
SOME OF OUR CLIENTS

From day-to-day tasks to financial reporting, we keep your books accurate and up-to-date so you can make informed decisions.

Our expert team ensures accurate, timely payments and tax filings, giving you peace of mind and the reliability your employees deserve.
### Our Process
At indinero, we've streamlined our onboarding process to make your transition to expert financial management smooth and efficient. Below are the initial steps we take together to transform your business finances.
![](https://www.indinero.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/home_1.webp)
#### All Systems Go
##### Start the journey together
![](https://www.indinero.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/tabler_affiliate.svg)
  * #### ![](https://www.indinero.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/carbon_web-services-container.svg)Consultation Meeting
It all begins with an initial conversation where we’ll dive deep into your specific needs and aspirations. We’re here to listen, understand your challenges, and align our expertise with your goals.
  * #### ![](https://www.indinero.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/carbon_ibm-cloud-internet-services.svg)Information Sharing
To provide an accurate scope of work, we’ll need access to your financial information. This crucial step allows us to perform a thorough review and tailor our services precisely to your needs. You can grant us access to your accounting software or share your financial statements—rest assured, we handle all data with the utmost care and confidentiality.
  * #### ![](https://www.indinero.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/carbon_web-services-task-definition-version.svg)Comprehensive Analysis
Our team of financial experts will meticulously review your data. We’ll uncover valuable insights and craft a tailored solution that addresses your unique business needs and sets the stage for growth.
  * #### ![](https://www.indinero.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/carbon_web-services-container.svg)Partnership Kickoff
Once we’re aligned, we’ll kick off our partnership and get to work. We’ll optimize your financial processes, map out a strategic roadmap, and equip you with the tools to make informed financial decisions.


### Industry Insiders for Your Sector
We don't just crunch numbers, we understand your business DNA
#### Technology
In the fast-paced tech world, you’re juggling SaaS metrics, R&D investments, and complex revenue recognition rules. You need to optimize your burn rate while scaling efficiently. With industry-specific financial expertise, you can turn these challenges into opportunities for growth.
#### Professional Services
As a professional services firm, you’re balancing project-based accounting, capacity planning, and the need for in-depth profitability analysis. You require streamlined financial processes to focus on client service. 
#### Nonprofits
We specialize in fund accounting, grant management, and regulatory compliance. We help to optimize your budget for maximum mission impact while maintaining transparency for stakeholders. Turn complex financials into clear, mission-driven strategies.
#### E-commerce
You may be dealing with inventory management, multi-channel sales tracking, complex sales tax requirements, and seasonal cash flow fluctuations. Our expertise can help you stay ahead in the digital marketplace and drive sustainable growth.
#### Healthcare
You’re juggling complex revenue cycles, strict compliance, and the pressure to optimize service line profitability—all while prioritizing patient care. Our experience in the industry helps you navigate these intricate challenges.
### What Our Clients Are Saying
The software and services are complete, the staff is fast and always helpful. Indinero gives me and my finance team the peace of mind we need to focus on growth.

### Industry Insiders for Your Sector
We don't just crunch numbers, we understand your business DNA
#### Technology
In the fast-paced tech world, you’re juggling SaaS metrics, R&D investments, and complex revenue recognition rules. You need to optimize your burn rate while scaling efficiently. With industry-specific financial expertise, you can turn these challenges into opportunities for growth.
#### Professional Services
As a professional services firm, you’re balancing project-based accounting, capacity planning, and the need for in-depth profitability analysis. You require streamlined financial processes to focus on client service. 
#### Nonprofits
We specialize in fund accounting, grant management, and regulatory compliance. We help to optimize your budget for maximum mission impact while maintaining transparency for stakeholders. Turn complex financials into clear, mission-driven strategies.
#### E-commerce
You may be dealing with inventory management, multi-channel sales tracking, complex sales tax requirements, and seasonal cash flow fluctuations. Our expertise can help you stay ahead in the digital marketplace and drive sustainable growth.
#### Healthcare
You’re juggling complex revenue cycles, strict compliance, and the pressure to optimize service line profitability—all while prioritizing patient care. Our experience in the industry helps you navigate these intricate challenges.

**Company Overview: inDinero**

Founded in 2010 and hailing from Los Angeles, California, inDinero was born from a desire to reshape financial management for small businesses. This company, part of Y Combinator's S10 batch, aims to empower startups and small enterprises with an intuitive financial dashboard that simplifies their financial operations.

**Mission and Services**

inDinero's mission is clear: provide a comprehensive financial dashboard that allows businesses to understand their finances like never before. By integrating a full team of bookkeepers, accountants, and CPAs with a robust real-time accounting software, inDinero helps clients track their financial health and make informed, effective decisions.

Their suite of services includes:

- **Bookkeeping:** Seamless handling of financial records, letting business owners focus on growth.
- **Accounting:** Keeping day-to-day financial activities accurate and up-to-date.
- **CFO Services:** Strategic financial guidance tailored for scalability and increased profitability.
- **Business Taxes:** Expert assistance with tax preparation and compliance.
- **Payroll:** Timely and accurate payroll processing to ensure employee satisfaction.

With a team of 250 skilled professionals, inDinero is not just about crunching numbers; it’s about creating meaningful financial strategies tailored to various industries, from tech startups to nonprofits.

**Client-Centric Approach and Cost Efficiency**

What sets inDinero apart is its integrated, team-oriented approach. Clients enjoy the benefits of high-level finance expertise without the hefty cost of a full in-house finance department. Pricing for services starts at $750 per month, making it a cost-effective alternative for many businesses.

The feedback from clients underscores this advantage, as many report significant savings on financial management costs while experiencing improved efficiencies and error reduction in their processes.

**Culture and Careers**

As a growing company, inDinero fosters an environment of internal mobility and professional growth. They are actively looking for talent, inviting those interested to check out career opportunities directly via their website.

In summary, inDinero is more than just a financial service provider; it’s a strategic partner for businesses endeavoring to streamline their operations and boost their growth potential. By offering a blend of personalized service, technology-driven insights, and industry-specific expertise, they empower their clients to navigate the financial landscape with confidence. For more details, you can visit [inDinero's website](http://indinero.com).
